@00h
1     ldi 0,#$0F  "r0 <= $0F
1010010000000000
0000111100000000


@02h
2     ldi 1,#$F0  "r1 <= $F0
1010010001000000
1111000000000000


@04h
3     add 0,1     "r0 <= $FF
0001000000000100


@05h
4     and 0,#$F8  "r0 <= $F8
0000110000000000
1111100000000000


@07h
5     ldi 2,#3    "r2 <= $03
1010010010000000
0000001100000000


@09h
6     str 2,#5    "m(5) <= $03
1010100010000000
0000010100000000


@0Bh
7     ldi 3,#5    "r3 <= $05
1010010011000000
0000010100000000


@0Dh
8     or  0,(3)   "r0 <= $FB
0011100000001100


@0Eh
9     ldi 4,#1    "r4 <= $01
1010010100000000
0000000100000000


@10h
10     str 4,#7    "m(7) <= $01
1010100100000000
0000011100000000


@12h
11     sub 0,#2(3) "r0 <= $FA
0010110000001100
0000001000000000


@14h
12     lsr 0,#1    "r0 <= $7D
0110110000000000
0000000100000000


@16h
13     lsl 0,#2    "r0 <= $F4
0101110000000000
0000001000000000


@18h
14     not 0,0     "r0 <= $0B
0100000000000000
